Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2011 12:46PM Listeningheart wrote: Just getting settled in from my biopsy.  They did a core biopsy, so I was pleased with that.    I was a bit shocked at how it worked.  Like an ear piercing gun for my tumor.  lol  They said I should have the results mid week, so just a few more days for some answers.  Thank you all for your kind words.  This site has really helped me.  :)
Posts.Title: Waiting Listeningheart onniebay

Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2011 02:57PM Listeningheart wrote: Hi all, just thought I would update.  Still waiting for  my results.  I finally called the radiology department today and the girl who answered the phone checked and said my results are in but the Dr. needs to review them then the nurse will call me tomorrow.  This sounds less than wonderful.  It makes me so aggrivated, I wish I hadn't of called and just waited untill tomorrow.  :(

Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2011 12:36PM Listeningheart wrote: Got my call and the lump was not on the previous mammo so they want to do the biopsy.  Luckily enough when scheduling called they had an opening tomorrow afternoon so I am quite happy about the timing.    Just having something planned and on the calendar is a huge help right now when no news is making me crazy.

Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2011 06:54PM Listeningheart wrote: Tenmom, he said there there was gonna be a loud "click".  And I said "what???"  It really did shock me that it wasn't so smooth.  It was cool to watch it all on the ultrasound though.     Marie,  I'm gonna find something to laugh and smile about.  Maybe take my youngest to a movie he has been wanting to see.  I hope you have a nice weekend as well.
